item.title: The Terrifying True Story of Darlie Routier
item.description: Reviewing the details of Darlie Routier’s case and its impact on true crime discussions.

item.title: Reflecting on an unforgettable tour filled with flights, road trips, and countless moments connecting with fans.
item.description: 18 cities. 30 flights. 3 road trips. 1 DoorDash outfit. & 1000+ hugs with all of you. The tour is officially wrapped and I’m sleeping until further notice. ….or until I land from this flight and go to the studio to record. Love y’all! ����

item.description: A story about a family navigating difficult circumstances after a personal relationship caused significant changes.

item.title: CrimeCon 2025 Reality Show Edition. A little late to this trend but had to do it.
